attributes.action: Prevent parts of the high peak becoming part of Greater Manchester.
attributes.additional_details: Greater Manchester will be the demise of the area’s in question such as Hadfield and Glossop. Our crime rates will increase, our house prices will fall drastically, and we do not want to be part of GM whatsoever. We are happy as Derbyshire. Leave us alone!
attributes.background: Recently there has been talk of parts of the High Peak becoming part of Greater Manchester. We live in Derbyshire, not Manchester. We do not want to become part of Greater Manchester!

rejection.details:
We can’t accept petitions that request action at a local level. 

You could ask your MP to take action on your concerns about this issue, including by asking them to present a public (paper) petition about this. 

You can find contact details for your local MP here: https://members.parliament.uk/FindYourMP 

And you can find out how to ask your MP to present a public (paper) petition here: https://www.parliament.uk/get-involved/sign-a-petition/paper-petitions/
